links.title: Elon Musk's Email to SpaceX Employees: Taking The Company Public
links.description: Excerpt from Ashlee Vance's biography - Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future Date: June 7, 2013, 12:43:06 AM PDT To: All All@spacex.com Subject: Going Public Per my recent comments, I am increasingly concerned about SpaceX going public before the Mars transport system is in place.

message.body: Stocks Move Higher, but Technicals are Bearish http://www.investopedia.com/news/stocks-move-higher-technicals-are-bearish-spy-dia/?utm_source=chart-advisor&utm_campaign=dfp-ntu-note&utm_term=9041888&utm_medium=email $SPY $aapl $amzn $msft $nvda $qqq $fb $tsla

links.title: Stocks Move Higher, but Technicals are Bearish
links.description: The U.S. markets moved largely higher this week, briefly touching new all-time highs on Wednesday before giving up ground by Friday. In addition to a positive earnings season, the second revision to fourth-quarter gross domestic product showed a positive 0.5% increase in consumer spending to a 3% rate, which was offset by a modest drop in non-residential investment.

links.title: Past Disasters Reveal Terrifying Future of Climate Change
links.description: Human activity is altering our climate. The vast majority of scientists agree on that. But there is disagreement about the rate at which it is happening and how it will impact us. Surprisingly, the answers to what our future holds with climate change may lie in the past, especially how it will affect our health.

links.title: Tesla To Operate An Autonomous EV Car-Share On Hainan Island In China, Possibly The Very First One In The World? - Robert Reinicke
links.description: China's tropical Hainan island's main industry, high-end tourism and conferences, abundance of luxury hotels and resorts with affluent foreign guests, and its naturally confined island location off the south coast of China, make it ideal for a controlled high visibility autonomous EV car-share demonstration program.

links.title: Tesla Model S caught on fire in Shanghai, company is investigating the cause
links.description: A Tesla Model S caught on fire at the Jinqiao Supercharger Station in Shanghai, China. While it was at the charging station, the vehicle reportedly wasn't charging when it caught on fire. Tesla launched a "full investigation" into the incident.

messages.body: $TSLA It is time to hold Musk accountable for his BS promotion of autopilot. Demand the feature be disabled. NOW. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-10-20/tesla-says-all-vehicles-in-production-capable-of-self-driving

links.title: Every Tesla in Production Capable of Self-Driving, Musk Says
links.description: After pushing the auto industry along toward an electric future, Elon Musk wants to put cars on an accelerated path to driving autonomously, equipping each new Tesla Motors Inc. model with the hardware needed for full self-driving capability.
